content.text: What do you do for a living?
I work in IT, I've been at my current job for six years and I'm still learning new things every day.
That sounds interesting, what is the best part of your job?
I'd say the best part is the people I work with, we have a great team and we really enjoy working together.
That's awesome, I'm glad you enjoy your job.
Thanks, I do! What about you, what do you do?
I'm a traveler, I wake up in a different hotel every morning and I spend my day exploring new places and meeting new people.
That sounds like an amazing job! I'm sure you get to see some really cool things.
I do, it's a lot of fun! I'm actually returning home tomorrow to spend time with my family and to continue my recovery from an injury.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. I hope you're feeling better soon.
Thanks, I appreciate it! I'm actually feeling pretty good, I'm just looking forward to getting back to my regular routine.
That's good to hear! I'm sure your family is excited to see you too.
Yeah, I'm excited to see them too. It's been a while since I've been home.
Well, I'm sure you'll have a great time!
